/circle6 Send relatives who can donate blood, should the need arise.
/circle6 Carry drugs and supplies such as an intravenous drip and set, antibiotics, Oxytocin 
injection and Magsulph injection (provided in your delivery kit) (see Annexure VII) 
in the vehicle in which the woman is being transported. 
/circle6 If the referral is being made aft  er the delivery, send the baby with the mother, if 
possible.
